name: Brave Little Wisp
description:
Guide all the lost souls to the waters of the afterlife and avoid being extinguished by the shadow lurkers!   Control:  --------------------------------------
--------------------------------------- 
Left Mouse Click/Hold to move. Mouse Wheel Scroll (or Q/E) for light range control.  Right-mouse hold for aiming decoy.  Right Mouse Release for throwing decoy. 
---------------------------------------
---------------------------------------  Created by himisir and Ratatatataskr for Brackey's Game Jam 2022.
